name: "Chatter of Joyful Nights"
effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.
description: Dahlia's specialty dish. "Ahem, I received a divine revelation instructing you to try this," a certain deacon says with a wink, presenting a plate of golden treats. Noting his polite and... somewhat expectant gaze, paired with the aroma of sweet apple cider, one might wonder â€” is this really divine instruction?
